name: brightspace-content-manager
description: Simple Brightspace content manager for creating announcements and discussion forums

scripts.generate-certs: mkdir -p certs && openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout certs/localhost-key.pem -out certs/localhost-cert.pem -days 365 -nodes -subj '/CN=localhost'

author: Brightspace Content Manager Team
